level.heading: EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION REFRESHER COURSE STANDARDS (§9-545)

level.text: The Director shall approve all EMS refresher courses that are intended for renewal of NREMT certification and are taught in the District of Columbia prior to the course being taught.
A refresher course taught in the District of Columbia shall meet the NREMT standards in effect at the time of the application in order to be eligible for NREMT certification renewal.
An educational institution that desires to receive District of Columbia approval in addition to CECBEMS approval may apply for approval pursuant to this section.
The educational institution shall submit an application signed by the institution’s medical director requesting approval as outlined in § 543.
The educational institution shall submit a separate application for each refresher course.
